attributes.action: abandon the use of overseas collections centres by the banking system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Let's face it ! The supervision of immigrant personnel in all walks of British life is atrocious - as a person who has been "stung" by the poor standards of customer banking service, harrassment and  shambles of insurance mismanagement, the petitioner is calling on the PM to tie up a few strings left by his predecessor. 

Given the implications for your administration in this dodgy matter, I would have thought you may have been more attentive. Do you wish to settle this out of court ?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
